1_warning.name: Flooding/Spamming
1_warning.description: Messages that occupy a large portion of the screen or involve the excessive posting of irrelevant content.

1_warning.name: Excessive Begging
1_warning.description: Repeatedly asking for favors, items, roles, privileges, or other benefits in an annoying or disruptive manner.

1_warning.name: XP Farming
1_warning.description: Sending messages solely to gain XP in the Arcane bot and disrupting the chat.

1_warning.name: Channel Misuse
1_warning.description: Using chatting, macro, or community channels incorrectly.

2_warning.name: Inappropriate/Suggestive Language
2_warning.description: Implication or reference to something offensive or sexual.

2_warning.name: Advertising/Self Promotion
2_warning.description: Promoting one's media for self gain without permission.

3_warning.name: Mod Bait
3_warning.description: Sending messages to provoke mods, even if not rule-breaking.

3_warning.name: Accusation without Evidence
3_warning.description: Accusing others without proof to damage their reputation.

3_warning.name: Discrimination
3_warning.description: Stereotyping or insulting based on race, gender, religion, etc.

instant_ban.name: Inappropriate Profile
instant_ban.description: Offensive/explicit Discord profile picture, name, or Roblox username.
